name: Brother's Bank
description:
A board-game style game that supports 2-4 players over online multiplayer.

Note: A custom PeerJS server is required to play Brother's Bank.

Press S while hovering over a business to sell it.

Press 1 to donate $50 to Player 1.

Press 2 to donate $50 to Player 2.

Press 3 to donate $50 to Player 3.

Press 4 to donate $50 to Player 4.
